title: 2006 Hong Kong–Shanghai Inter Club Championship
text:
2006 Hong Kong–Shanghai Inter Club Championship is officially the 1st staging of <a href="Hong%20Kong-Shanghai%20Inter%20Club%20Championship">Hong Kong-Shanghai Inter Club Championship</a>. <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Rangers%20FC">Buler Rangers</a> represented <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> to compete by topping the <a href="Hong%20Kong%20First%20Division%20League">league</a> after the first half of the season while <a href="Shanghai%20Shenhua">Shanghai Shenhua</a> represented <a href="Shanghai">Shanghai</a>.
<a href="Shanghai%20Shenhua">Shanghai Shenhua</a> lifted the first trophy of this competition after winning 1-0.
Squads.
"Some of the players include:"
